if you can | speak more slowly | if you can speak | that would be great | more slowly
S0091: es difícil | pensar | lo suficientemente rápido | para responder | a tiempo | para responder a tiempo
it's difficult | to think | quickly enough | to answer | in time | to answer in time
S0092: me gustaría | continuar haciendo | esto | por un tiempo | continuar haciendo esto
I'd like | to keep on doing | this | for a while | keep on doing this
S0093: es hora de | es hora de ir | ahora
it's time to | it's time to go | now
